titleStmt.title: Exodus, or, The decease of holy men and ministers consider'd in the nature, certainty, causes, and improvement thereof : a sermon preach't Sept. 12. 1675 : by occasion of the much lamented death of that learned and reverend minister of Christ, Dr. Lazarus Seaman ...
titleStmt.author: Jenkyn, William, 1613-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Brewster and William Cooper ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
